After battle stat gains
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): After battle stat gains
By mepersoner on Sunday, January 27, 2002 - 03:52 pm:

I think I've brought this up before, but I'm not for sure. Anyways, the highest stat gain I've seen after a battle is a 16 in one stat, I've seen this from two hengers and one plant/worm. Has anyone gotten higher than this?

By Kurasu Soratobu on Monday, January 28, 2002 - 01:47 am:

I've seen 16 a few times as well, but being that I've seen 16 in an A-class battle, with a monster that likes (as in likes/dislikes) battle, it may well be that it can go higher. I've never had a battle-liking monster go past B-class (because they were always money-makers for me, since battle did so much for them).

By JRay on Monday, January 28, 2002 - 06:22 am:

I've had a sixteen, I had one last night with an Ape/Hare after a Major Four Battle. But maybe thats what liking and disliking battle does... effect your gains after battle?

By JRay on Tuesday, January 29, 2002 - 06:13 am:

Yep.... never had anything over 10 with something that didn't like battle.
